scripts.create:existing: npm run wp-env start && npm run update:configs && npm run update:plugins && npm run update:theme && yarn && npm run update:cron-1 && npm run update:cron-2 && npm run update:jetpack-1 && npm run update:jetpack-2 && npm run update:permalinks
scripts.create: npm run composer-install && npm run create:existing
scripts.update:configs: npm run wp-env run cli wp config set JETPACK_DEV_DEBUG true && npm run wp-env run cli wp config set WPORG_SANDBOXED true;
scripts.update:permalinks: npm run wp-env run cli wp rewrite structure '/%postname%/'
scripts.update:plugins: npm run wp-env run cli wp plugin activate wordpress-importer jetpack wporg-learn/wporg-learn.php wporg-markdown/plugin.php
scripts.update:theme: npm run wp-env run cli wp theme activate pub/wporg-learn-2020
scripts.update:cron-1: npm run wp-env run cli wp cron event run wporg_learn_manifest_import
scripts.update:cron-2: npm run wp-env run cli wp cron event run wporg_learn_markdown_import
scripts.update:jetpack-1: npm run wp-env run cli wp jetpack module activate contact-form
scripts.update:jetpack-2: npm run wp-env run cli wp jetpack module activate markdown
